                    Text: 
                    Temazepam



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Restoril

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Anxiolytic; Sedative; Benzodiazepine

CHEMICAL NAME

7-chloro-1,3-dihydro-3-hydroxy-1-methyl-5-phenyl-2H- 1,4-benzodiazepin-2-one

DESCRIPTION

Temazepam is a benzodiazepine used in the short-term treatment of insomnia and anxiety.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

                    Context: 
                    This section is the dedicated entry for Temazepam in Erowid's Pharmaceuticals Vault. It provides core information about the drug, including brand names, effects classification, chemical name, description of its medical use, related categories, user experiences, and links to additional resources. It appears within a broader index of psychoactive substances and pharmaceutical drugs, serving as a reference point for those researching the effects, health information, legal status, and user reports related to Temazepam.
